channel.title: Typescript on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Typescript on Greg Herlein

item.title: Programming Languages in 2025: Popularity, Jobs, LLM Proficiency, and Deployment Complexity
item.description: Four factors now drive language choice: developer adoption, job market demand, LLM code generation quality, and deployment complexity. Here’s how they intersect.

item.title: Learnings from patching a bug in a modern project
item.description: I’m continuing to dive deep on modern typescript/node development. I fixed a bug in a new tool I am using (projen) and learned a ton along the way. This post is to share some of that.
